overview: The film is a cinematic stroll through the city of Genoa and an exploration of the alleys in the city centre. It also shows the palaces, churches and basilicas, and then takes a long look at the cimitero monumentale di Staglieno, before climbing to the heights of Genoa, which offer an astonishing panorama of the city and its immense port, crossed by the Strada sopraelevata.
title: Il Gergo Inquieto
